Name: Bald-o-meter
UserPrompt: add a hud element to track how bald the streamer is
ExecutionCode:
RunOnClient([=[
-- Create Baldness Tracker HUD Element
timer.Simple(0.1, function()
    if not ChaosHUD then return end
    
    -- Register a new column for Baldness
    ChaosHUD.RegisterColumn("Baldness", 102, function() return true end, 35)
    
    -- Baldness state - starts at 0, slowly increases over time
    AIChaos_BaldnessState = AIChaos_BaldnessState or {
        level = 0,
        max = 100,
        rate = 0.5, -- baldness per second
        last_update = CurTime()
    }
    
    -- Create the base numeric element
    local bald_base = ChaosHUD.CreateNumericElement("BALDNESS", function()
        -- Update baldness over time
        local dt = CurTime() - AIChaos_BaldnessState.last_update
        AIChaos_BaldnessState.last_update = CurTime()
        AIChaos_BaldnessState.level = math.min(AIChaos_BaldnessState.max, AIChaos_BaldnessState.level + (AIChaos_BaldnessState.rate * dt))
        return math.Round(AIChaos_BaldnessState.level)
    end, { warn_low = false })
    
    if ChaosHUD.HStackMap["Baldness"] then
        ChaosHUD.HStackMap["Baldness"].base_element = bald_base
    end
    
    -- Add a hair loss meter aux bar
    local hair_aux = ChaosHUD.CreateAuxElement("HAIR LOSS", function()
        return AIChaos_BaldnessState.level
    end, function()
        local items = {}
        if AIChaos_BaldnessState.level > 80 then
            table.insert(items, "CHROME DOME")
        elseif AIChaos_BaldnessState.level > 50 then
            table.insert(items, "RECEDING")
        elseif AIChaos_BaldnessState.level > 20 then
            table.insert(items, "THINNING")
        end
        return items
    end)
    
    ChaosHUD.AddVStackElement("Baldness", "HairLoss", hair_aux, 10)
    
    -- Add a custom follicle status element
    local follicle_elem = {}
    function follicle_elem:GetSize()
        return 102 * ChaosHUD.GetScale(), 30 * ChaosHUD.GetScale()
    end
    
    function follicle_elem:Draw(x, y, h)
        local scale = ChaosHUD.GetScale()
        local w = 102 * scale
        h = h or (30 * scale)
        
        draw.RoundedBox(ChaosHUD.Styles.CornerRadius, x, y, w, h, ChaosHUD.Colors.BgStandard)
        
        surface.SetFont("ChaosHUD_Text")
        surface.SetTextColor(ChaosHUD.Colors.Yellow)
        surface.SetTextPos(x + (8 * scale), y + (4 * scale))
        surface.DrawText("FOLLICLES")
        
        -- Draw hair strands that disappear based on baldness
        local max_hairs = 10
        local remaining = math.Round(max_hairs * (1 - AIChaos_BaldnessState.level / 100))
        
        local hair_start_x = x + (10 * scale)
        local hair_y = y + (14 * scale)
        
        for i = 1, max_hairs do
            local hx = hair_start_x + ((i - 1) * (8 * scale))
            local col = (i <= remaining) and ChaosHUD.Colors.Yellow or Color(50, 50, 50, 100)
            
            surface.SetDrawColor(col)
            -- Draw a little hair strand
            local sway = math.sin(CurTime() * 2 + i) * (2 * scale)
            surface.DrawLine(hx, hair_y + (12 * scale), hx + sway, hair_y)
            surface.DrawLine(hx + 1, hair_y + (12 * scale), hx + sway + 1, hair_y)
        end
        
        return w, h
    end
    
    ChaosHUD.AddVStackElement("Baldness", "Follicles", follicle_elem, 20)
    
    print("[AIChaos] Baldness Tracker initialized!")
end)
]=])
UndoCode:
RunOnClient([=[
if ChaosHUD and ChaosHUD.HStackMap["Baldness"] then
    ChaosHUD.HStackMap["Baldness"] = nil
    for k, v in ipairs(ChaosHUD.HStack) do
        if v.id == "Baldness" then
            table.remove(ChaosHUD.HStack, k)
            break
        end
    end
end
AIChaos_BaldnessState = nil
]=])
